member.name: IDWritePixelSnapping.GetCurrentTransform
member.summary: Gets a transform that maps abstract coordinates to DIPs.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a structure which has transform information for pixel snapping.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWritePixelSnapping.GetPixelsPerDip
member.summary: Gets the number of physical pixels per DIP.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the number of physical pixels per DIP.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWritePixelSnapping
member.summary: Defines the pixel snapping properties such as pixels per DIP(device-independent pixel) and the current transform matrix of a text renderer.
